data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pan, Zhi-Xiang (2015): Two new species of Homidia (Collembola, Entomobryidae) and a key to species in the genus from Zhejiang Province, China. Zootaxa 4034 (3): 515-530, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4034.3.5
